experiences.title: Math Tutor
description: Tutoring primary and secondary students online with personalized lesson plans. From teaching basic classroom lesson to tutoring students for competitive secondary high schools.

experiences.title: Portfolio Advising
description: Advicing high school students on their portfolio for University both in Thailand and abroad

experiences.title: Class Representative of Student Committee
description: Participated in student council meetings and communicating information though class as well as organized school events such as Loy Krathong Festival

experiences.title: President of Academic Camp
description: Designed and directed the overall flow of STEM academic activities for 140 5th graders at Wat Thakam School in a one-day camp.
Created a technology activities based on AI as well and run a workshop for the kids.

experiences.title: Head of Stage
description: Advicing high school students on their portfolio for University both in Thailand and abroad
